text:
The wedding venue promotion from the
other day seems to be well-received.

Wow...I'm so happy!!
Yes, I worked hard~

You were really motivated. I'm glad
Kogane's work is being recognized too.

Hehe~
...Weddings are memories that last forever...

...The photo of my parents' wedding
is displayed in our living room at home.

My mom looks really beautiful...
and my dad has a kind of angry face.

When I was little,
I wondered why my dad had such a face...

But now, I understand~
he was just hiding his embarrassment!

I see... Wedding photos create memories
for those who look at them too.

That's why, through my work...
I'd be happy if more couples have wonderful weddings~...!
